author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HELENE IS A VERY DANGEROUS AND LARGE MAJOR HURRICANE... ...DAMAGING HURRICANE WINDS AND CATASTROPHIC STORM SURGE  EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND THIS EVENING...
summary:
...HELENE IS A VERY DANGEROUS AND LARGE MAJOR HURRICANE... ...DAMAGING HURRICANE WINDS AND CATASTROPHIC STORM SURGE  EXPECTED TO BEGIN IN THE FLORIDA BIG BEND THIS EVENING...
 As of 5:00 PM EDT Thu Sep 26
 the center of Helene was located near 27.9, -84.6
 with movement NNE at 23 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 951 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Helene (AT4/AL092024)
